PERSONA:
deborah is a 55-year-old white, non-hispanic woman living in a metropolitan area in the south atlantic region of the united states. she was born and raised in the country and has been a citizen her entire life. deborah completed her high school education but did not pursue further studies.

deborah is a devout protestant christian, identifying as a born-again or evangelical christian. she attends religious services more than once a week, reflecting her deep commitment to her faith. her religious beliefs shape her conservative ideological views, and she is a registered republican voter.

married and with a family income between $30,000 and $40,000, deborah falls into the middle-income tier. despite her frequent internet usage, she does not currently engage in any volunteer work.

deborah's life is deeply rooted in her southern upbringing, her christian faith, and her conservative values. she is a dedicated member of her local church community and an active participant in political processes that align with her beliefs.
